instruction_start_1: You can download photo/video from Instagram post.
instruction_start_2: You can add any Instagram profile, to track it`s privacy status changes.
instruction_download_1: Press three dots in the top left corner of the post, you want to save photo/video (profile must be public)
error_no_tries_left: Oops! No tries left, please try again later
onb_text1:
This application will help you track when Instagram profile, you interested in, will finally become public.
   Do you know that sooner or later everyone taking part in the giveaways? And one of the conditions for participation in giveaways, is an open profile.
   Lurkr will help you track this moment!
onb_text3:
Frequently information updates may be temporarily blocked by Instagram. This blocking lasts 24 hours, and does not affect you own Instagram profile.
   To reduce the risk of blocking, it is recommended:
   • do not reduce update period (its set to 1 hour by default, you can change it in Setting of app);
   • do not perform frequent updates manually.
onb_text4:
To automatically update information, the application must periodically receive data from the Internet.
   Therefore, permission is required to run Lurkr in the background.
   To grant permission, click this button:
